column4: if I have a 7.04 server sitting around, how likely am I to fubar it by trying to upgrade to 8, and thence to 9?
yeah I read the EOL upgrade guide
usually depends on how much you added from outside repos.  the more unsupported stuff the less likely it will go smoothly
I don't think there was much extra added... hmm.
ah sorry about the language. slipped out.
all standard sources, plus security, plus a freenx service that I never got to work right so it can be safely removed anyway
there's an EOL upgrade guide on the wiki I was reading the other day
if needed, use the old.roeps and go for it.  I assume you have a backup
I think I'm going to drive to datacenter and make one before I do it :)
make a sep home while you are at it
what do you mean separate home?
that keeps your files sep from os so os can more easlily be updated
FYI, I keep a stable and a testing linux on every box
